meanings.definition: A person or thing that extends or lengthens something.
meanings.sent1: The extenders helped make the bridge longer.
meanings.sent2: The extenders on the table legs made it taller.
meanings.sent3: The extenders in the story made it more interesting.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as an extender, reaching out to those in need.
meanings.sent5: The extenders in the game allowed the player to explore further.

meanings.definition: A substance added to a product to increase its volume or bulk.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for extenders to make the cake bigger.
meanings.sent2: The paint had extenders mixed in to cover a larger area.
meanings.sent3: The extenders in the shampoo made it foam up more.
meanings.sent4: His lies were like extenders, stretching the truth beyond recognition.
meanings.sent5: The extenders in the detergent helped clean more clothes.

meanings.definition: A device that increases the range or reach of something.
meanings.sent1: The wifi extenders improved the signal in the house.
meanings.sent2: The extenders on the vacuum cleaner helped reach high places.
meanings.sent3: The extenders on the phone made it easier to hold.
meanings.sent4: His telescope was an extender, allowing him to see distant stars.
meanings.sent5: The extenders on the microphone amplified the singer's voice.
